intro: I am an experienced Web Developer with a drive to learn and work with emerging technologies. I like to write code that is efficient, reusable, and well-documented. I love working with front-end technologies such as Angular JS, React JS, and jQuery. In the past, I have worked on the development of RESTful APIs, Relational Databases, back-ends and front-ends for websites. I learn new technologies fairly quickly.
skillSummary: I have experience working as a web developer and building websites of highest quality that are responsive, perform efficiently, and work on multiple platforms. I have worked from front-end to server-side programming and designing relational databases. I use Github and Bitbucket for version control for my apps

mySkills.title: Front-End Skills
mySkills.description: While working as a web developer, I learned to use above technologies to build websites with beautiful user interfaces, that work on various devices and browsers. I have used Angular JS and React JS to build single-page applications with reusable components, jQuery and jQuery UI to build additional functionality and dynamic elements for exceptional user experience.

mySkills.title: Back-End Skills
mySkills.description: I have experience working with the above mentioned server-side technologies. I strictly follow the DRY approach when coding. I write source code that is efficient, easy to read and reuse, and is well-documented to assist future developers. I follow object-oriented programming principles to design and maintain projects.

mySkills.title: Databases
mySkills.description: Relational databases are the heart of large-scale and enterprise level applications. I have experience working with Microsoft SQL Server and MySQL to design and maintain relational databases.
